title: Womens Dress
title_original: Women's Plus Size Country Village Sweater Cardigan

specs.Best Sellers Rank: #697,798 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #3,737 in Women's Cardigans

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Sweaters > Cardigans

reviews.customers_say: Customers like the sweater's beautiful colors. The size receives mixed feedback, with one customer noting it runs large.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely and warm.
items.body: Fairly heavy and quite warm. Beautiful colors and fabric. I ordered the teal. Read more
items.author: swangirl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE this sweater!!
items.body: I live in Texas so heavy coats are not practical - but this cardigan is super soft, great if you are tall (it is long) and very flattering on how it hangs. I have this in red, blue and black and white. This is light enough to wear in a Minnesota summer, but heavy enough to use for a fall/winter jacket in Texas. Read more
items.author: Carmody Quinn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice
items.body: Nice love the colors Read more
items.author: Jane Morlan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars great value for the money
items.body: looks trendy and it is warm too Read more
items.author: Suzanna

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fit is large.
items.body: Fit is large and hangs way too long. Read more
items.author: Bobbie

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars What's with the fabric content?
items.body: The Amazon description says 90% cotton/10% acrylic, but the label on the sweater says 50% cotton/50% acrylic. I have never seen so much hideous pilling on a sweater in my life! I shouldn't have washed it first and now am stuck with a garment that I cannot return. Read more
items.author: Designer NW

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love it but I ordered the wrong size.
items.body: My fit is between 1X and 2X so the mid-size is not any fault of the compan Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Cute but thin... seam separated.
items.body: This is thin and the seam separated where the trim meets the sweater. Read more
items.author: Kristen

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black White Buffalo Plaid, Emerald Black Buffalo Plaid, Red Black Buffalo Plaid, Vibrant Turq Navy Buffalo Plaid, Dark Sapphire Black Buffalo Plaid. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
